title: First Floor Bright Open Unit W/D, Parking and Central A/C
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
If you’re searching for a beautiful 1 or 2 bedroom Walnut Creek apartment, prepare to fall in love with The Bridge at Walnut Creek.

With an incredible location at the heart of the “Jewel of the East Bay” (as Walnut Creek is often known), this fantastic location places you in close proximity to some of the best attractions the city has to offer.
True to its name, The Bridge at Walnut Creek is nestled alongside the beautiful San Ramon creek, and features lush, shaded community grounds.

Within walking distance you’ll find access to the Iron Horse Trail, beloved by hikers and cyclists alike, as well as Walnut Creek’s bustling downtown area, which features a wide variety of incredible dining and shopping options.

At The Bridge at Walnut Creek apartment community, you’ll find incredible 1 or 2 bedroom East Bay apartments with spacious floor plans of up to 1200 square feet and a wide array of fantastic amenities, including patios or balconies, and in-unit washers and driers in select apartments.

Right now, we’re also hard at work renovating the interiors of our apartments that are available for move-in, while also bringing new and improved amenities to the community grounds, including an upgraded dog park, a new fitness center, a revamped pool area, and much more.
Two indoor cats or two dogs will be allowed per apartment.
$500 refundable pet deposit per pet and $50 Monthly pet rent per dog, $35 Monthly pet rent per cat.
Please contact the Leasing Office for more Information.
Ask about specials available on specific units!
Please call our leasing office for complete parking policy information.
Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven
Shared pool, Fitness center, Barbecue, Bark Park
24 Hour 7 Days A Week Courtesy Patrol, Elevator
